body.name: Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash - All Natural Refreshing Peppermint, Spearmint, and Wintermint Flavored Fresh Breath Mouthwash with Mild Foaming Action - Vegan, BPA-Free, Parabens-Free, Fluoride-Free, 16oz

features: ELEVATE YOUR ORAL CARE WITH DR. GABE GLOW UP MOUTHWASH - Experience the ultimate oral care journey with our all-natural mouthwash. Crafted with an exquisite blend of essential oils including Refreshing Peppermint, Spearmint, and Wintermint, our formula delivers a burst of minty freshness that revitalizes your breath, leaving you feeling confident and renewed.

FRESH BREATH, NO BURN - Say goodbye to uncomfortable burning sensations that often accompany other brands. Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash boasts a refreshing formula that invigorates your breath without the harshness. Enjoy a clean, fresh mouthfeel after every use, enhancing your confidence without compromising on comfort.

MILD FOAMING, MAXIMUM REFRESHMENT - Experience the delight of mild foaming action that adds an extra layer of invigoration to your routine. As you swish, our mouthwash gently foams, ensuring an all-encompassing cleanse that reaches every nook and cranny of your mouth. Feel refreshed and ready to take on the day with confidence.

PERFECT HARMONY WITH GLOW UP TOOTHPASTE - Elevate your oral care routine by pairing our mouthwash with the Glow Up toothpaste. The unique flavor combination creates a symphony of soothing and invigorating sensations. Revel in the perfect harmony of minty freshness that lingers, giving you a truly holistic and satisfying oral care experience.

EMBRACE NATURE, EMBRACE CONFIDENCE - Choose an oral care solution that aligns with your values. Our vegan, BPA-Free, Parabens-Free, and Fluoride-Free formula emphasizes natural ingredients without compromising on efficacy. Transform your daily routine into a refreshing ritual that not only leaves your breath feeling fresh but also supports your commitment to a healthier lifestyle. Experience the power of Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash and unlock a new level of oral care confidence
body.description: Elevate Your Daily Routine with Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash!A Symphony of Natural FreshnessExperience a new level of oral care with Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash. Infused with an exquisite assort-mint of essential oils, including Refreshing Peppermint, Spearmint, and Wintermint, this all-natural formula delivers a burst of natural freshness that revitalizes your breath.Gentle, Yet PowerfulBid farewell to discomfort. Our mouthwash is designed to cleanse without the harsh burning sensation commonly associated with other brands. The refreshing formula leaves your breath feeling immaculate and invigorated, creating a truly comfortable experience that supports your oral health journey.Mild Foaming Action, Maximum RefreshmentEmbrace the invigorating power of mild foaming action. Each use of our Glow Up Mouthwash brings forth a gentle yet effective foaming action that revitalizes your senses. The aftermath? A refreshing feeling that lingers, leaving you ready to conquer the day with confidence.A Perfect Harmony for Complete CareEnhance your routine with the ideal companion to our Glow Up toothpaste. Our mouthwash's unique flavor effortlessly complements the toothpaste, creating a seamless and invigorating oral care duo. Together, they form the foundation for a truly soothing and revitalizing experience.Nature's Way to a Confident SmileWith a commitment to your well-being, our mouthwash is vegan, BPA-free, parabens-free, and fluoride-free. Experience a natural approach to oral care that leaves you feeling refreshed, confident, and ready to shine. Elevate your daily routine with Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash – where nature and science unite for your most radiant smile.Transform Your Oral Care Today! Elevate Your Routine with Dr. Gabe Glow Up Mouthwash and Experience the Refreshing Difference. Order Now for a Truly Invigorating Smile!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #82,756 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #383 in Mouthwashes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Holy moley, this stuff, along with the same brand toothpaste, is extremely minty if that's what you like, I am thrilled with it. It cleans and feels so fresh for quite a long while after using. I would not advise for children or anyone who doesn't tolerate say, Listering and very strong/burny sorts of washes, it is potent! I pour an amount of wash into the cap and then fill with water, so even diluted, it is a freshness bomb and I enjoy it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just wanted to try something different and I really loved how refreshing this is. My teeth felt even whiter after using the toothpaste and then this mouthwash. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried them all. Used to use listerine and while lisyerine is top notch, Dr Gabe’s beats it by a mile. I don’t wake up with bad breath anymore ever. Best mouthwash. Mix a little in my waterpik reservoir and it’s amazing. Thanks Dr Gabe. Your Pashmak is the best. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Minty but too sweet
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash has a nice blend of mint oils but I was put off by the stevia that made it too sweet and left a strange taste in my mouth. You might like it if you're used to stevia in your drinks, but I don't care for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am a Dentist and I love this product.
reviews.reviewText: I tried this product for myself after speaking to a couple of friends. I happen to be a dentist so I am very specific when it comes to products we use at home. I can say without hesitation that this product absolutely hit it out of the park. Love it. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I took a chance on this. Not seeing the ingredients posted online, I was disappointed to read the side of the bottle. It doesn't contain anything that is actually proven to do anything. I'm not going to pretend to be a doctor (like whoever came up with this concoction) but rinsing with tap water probably more beneficial than this.This is a waste of plastic, delivery resources and whatever it's made of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash left my mouth feeling incredibly clean and refreshed. It has a minty flavor and foaming action. It left my breath smelling and feeling fresh for an extended period. If you have a large household, you may need more than one bottle, but I use this one solely for my own use and do not share.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mouthwash ever
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching for a great mouthwash for years, and I finally found it. This keeps my breath fresh, doesn't burn to much, and makes my mouth feel clean. I would recommend this to anyone I know.
